title: Axel Kent
text: Hello! My name is Axel. This is a website I’m putting together to showcase my data science work.

title: Closeread Project
text:
This app examines the launch metrics in a baseball series. The app lets users filter observations by game date, pitcher, batter, and event type. Clicking on a point shows the associated Baseball Savant video.


Live App
GitHub Repository

title: Closeread Project
section: Closeread Article submitted to the Closeread Prize
text:
Closeread Article submitted to the Closeread Prize
After building the Launch Metrics Shiny app, I put together an interactive article featuring the app. To retell a story of the series, users will scroll and see a series of interactive plots that highlight patterns of balls in play and key series events.


Closeread Article
GitHub Repository

title: COL at SD: 4/11/2025 - 4/13/2025
text: Click on a plot’s observation to see a video of the play!
